alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 9:06AM EST until January 14 at 12:15AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water floods lowlands along the Still River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Saturday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 12.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Sat 8 am: 11.5 Forecast: Sat 1 pm 12.1 Sat 7 pm 12.0 Sun 1 am 11.6 Sun 7 am 11.2 &&
